title: Schiff unveils bill to create coronavirus commission to review US response
description: House Intelligence Committee Chairman Adam Schiff (D-Calif.) on Friday introduced legislation that would establish a commission to review the U.S. response to the coronavirus pandemic.Schiff said that it would be s...
